text: Trade samples r 5ml to 25ml/gr.These quantities r not saleable.Nepalcustoms at Bhairawa charged Rs1690 duty +extras for clearing such demonstrable samples of zero value. How can nepal trade happen ? Declare if u r anti trade @nepalcustoms @wto @NepalChamber @nicci_1994 @MoCNepal

@NepalGov inr 100 should be npr 180 now. It is 100 : 160. Why we are favouring nepal when the govt n administration is hating n harming indian trade @nepalcustoms @NepalChamber @NepalGov @MoCNepal @FinMinIndia

@csapkota @MoCNepal Without implementation, we don‚Äôt know what will happen. Due to such uncertainty, foreign investors fear the outcome. As we identify the cause, of course we think of amending laws or correcting the situation in any other way for easing it for investors.‚Äù

@csapkota @MoCNepal Aayushi Koirala says,‚ÄúThe reason behind the choice of international laws for foreign investors is their element of certainty. But, the new Public Private Partnership Act that concerns foreign investors, is not tested and its interpretation is also known without it being applied.
